p: Compound 4b was obtained as a white solid (961 mg, 96%), mp 111‒112 °C, R f = 0.28 (ss C); 1H NMR: δ ppm 1.05 (s, 3H, H-18); 1.31 (s, 3 × 3H, C(CH 3)3); 2.81 (m, 2H, H-6); 5.11 (s, 2H, OCH 2); 5.50 (s, 2H, NCH 2); 6.69 (s, 1H, H-4); 6.78 (m, 1H, H-2); 7.16‒7.20 (overlapping multiplets, 3H, H-1, H-2′, H-6′); 7.39 (d, 2H, H-3′, H-5′); 7.55 (s, 1H, C = CH). Compound 4a is identical with the compound described in Ref. [ 16].
